thread.title: Vena Opens Doors Down Under After Successful First Year in South Africa
thread.title_full: Vena Opens Doors Down Under After Successful First Year in South Africa

author: Michael A. Corcoran
title: Vena Opens Doors Down Under After Successful First Year in South Africa
text:
On the heels of a highly successful first year in South Africa, Vena Solutions is proud to announce the upcoming opening of Vena Australia. The fastest growing cloud-based provider of corporate performance management (CPM) software, Vena will now have offices spanning four continents with customers in dozens of countries. Just 15 months after announcing Vena South Africa, the company has quickly established a national presence and early market leadership in financial and strategic CPM solutions based on enterprise-class Excel spreadsheets. Vena South Africa already boasts a client base spanning hundreds of users across industries including financial services, mining, agriculture and telecommunications.
“This has been a great year for Vena’s growth, both overall and in particular through our expansion outside of North America,” said Don Mal, CEO of Vena Solutions. “With offices in the United States, United Kingdom, Netherlands and South Africa, Australia is a natural next step in the company’s global expansion plans.”
Vena Australia is in the final stages of establishing a continent-wide network of trusted and well connected solutions partners. With this network in place, and a growing track record of providing industry-specific solutions, the company anticipates initial client wins in Australia’s financial services, mining and public sectors.
“Stay tuned for more news from Vena Australia, and even more next year,” added Mal. “Looking at 2016, we already have our sights set on Hong Kong, Singapore and the Middle East as ripe markets for enterprise-class Excel solutions.”
About Vena Solutions – http://www.venasolutions.com
Vena turns Microsoft Excel into an enterprise-class business solution with features including a centralized database, workflow, version control and a detailed audit trail. With Vena, hundreds of leading brands are now getting trusted numbers and insights – fast – without sacrificing the Excel spreadsheets they know and use. They use Vena for financial and strategic corporate performance management (CPM) applications including budgeting, forecasting, financial close management, reporting and disclosure. Vena is the fastest growing cloud CPM vendor, and the only one to embrace – not replace – Excel spreadsheets.
